article.title: Harris Supports Counter-Narcotics Operations
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: Army Space and Missile Defense Command

article.text: Harris Corporation, RF Communications Division, Rochester, New York, was awarded a $37,974,251 firm-fixed-price contract for the tactical communication services and equipment in support of counternarcotics operations. The U.S. Army Space and Missile Defense Command, Huntsville, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
